Title: Random Acts of Violence
Plot: Warrick investigates the drive-by murder of a young girl in his old neighbourhood. Nick tackles the murder of a computer company employee.
GuestStars: Keith David, Dwayne L. Barnes, Maury Sterling, Kevin Chapman, David Packer, Jim Rash, Tom Virtue, Daniel Farris, Chanel Gaines, Barry Sigismondi, Shawn H. Smith, Ty Upshaw
